name: The Golden Saucisse
description:
Z - UP ARROW KEY to move up 

Q - LEFT ARROW KEY to go left

D - RIGHT ARROW KEY to go right

You'll find 2 power-ups to help you finish the level, good luck!

Hello!

This is my first Game Jam, this was a fantastic experience!

I did everything on Twitch, it was a lot of fun to share with the viewers the development of the Game :o: 

Here is the pitch:

You were enjoying a beautiful day on your boat, eating a tasty hot-dog, when your sausage suddenly dropped out of the bread and fell in the water.

As you are very hungry, you quickly put your diving suit on and jump in the sea to try to get your sausage back.

But hurry up, your precious piece of meat may lose its flavor if it stays in the water for too long!!
